title: Client assets not loading since new patch?
body: My client hasn't been loading assets since the last patch. All the links work but no pictures. I just tried to get into a game and the champ select screen didn't pop up either. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [resetting your internet options](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660#wq3), if that doesn't help please try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).

If neither of the above helps let me know and we can walk through some additional fixes.
Cheers for the response, neither fix is working unfortunately. You got anything else to try?

Hey there,

My apologies for a very delayed response. I've been busy lately.

Has this issue resolved itself at this point? If not, could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5), let me know if that helps.
